text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia dalsumi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell of this micromollusc grows to a length of 1 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
Cape Verde
